fields.label: Statements

semantics.label: Sample solution
semantics.description: You can optionally add a sample solution that's shown after the student created a text. It's called sample solution because there probably is not only one solution.

fields.label: Introduction
fields.description: You can optionally leave the students some explanations about your example. The explanation will only show up if you add an example, too.
fields.placeholder: Please remember that you were not expected to come up with the exact same solution. It's just a good example.

fields.label: Sample solution text
fields.description: The student will see a "Show solution" button after submitting if you provide some text here.

fields.label: Resources

semantics.label: Mipangilio ya tabia
semantics.description: Chaguzi hizi zitakuwezesha kudhibiti tabia hiyo.

fields.label: Washa jaribu tena?
fields.description: Weka tiki kwenye hii ikiwa unataka mtumiaji aweze kujaribu tena

fields.label: Jaza taarifa mapema kwenye kauli hizo
fields.description: Mtumiaji anaanza na kauli ambazo tayari zimeagizwa

fields.label: Badilisha kauli hizo bila mpangilio
fields.description: Itabadilisha kauli hizo zilizojazwa taarifa bila mpangilio

fields.label: Idadi ya viwanja vya kutua

fields.description: Ruhusu watumiaji kuongeza kauli zao wenyewe

fields.label: Onyesha maoni yaliyotolewa chini ya kauli
fields.description: Ikiwa mtumiaji ametoa maoni, hii inaonyeshwa kwenye orodha ya kauli

fields.label: Onyesha muhtasari
fields.description: Unataka mtumiaji atoe muhtasari unaoeleza sababu za majibu yake

Mjulishe mtumiaji kwamba data itapotea ikiwa ataendelea

fields.label: Maandishi yaliyoonyeshwa katika kitufe cha ‘Wasilisha' wakati wa kuunda waraka
Maandishi yaliyoonyeshwa baada ya kuwasilisha

fields.label: Ujumbe unaosomeka kwa msomaji skrini wakati kuburutwa inahamishwa ndani ya orodha hiyo
fields.default: Umehamisha kitu kutoka nafasi yake :startPositionhadi nafasi :endPosition kati ya :listLength

fields.default: Umehamisha kipengee kutoka kwenye orodha :startListNamekatika nafasi:startPosition kati ya:startListLength hadi orodha:destinationListNamekatika nafasi :destinationPositionkati ya :destinationListLength

fields.label: Message read to the screen reader when draggable is dropped over dropzone
fields.default: Draggable item :itemId was dropped over droppable area :droppableId.
